message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $95 for this exceptional item. I believe this is a fair deal that respects both our interests.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the features of the product, but $95 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to pay $80 for it. If that works for you, we can close the deal.
